lore: More so even than whatever passes for a ‘normal’ Painboy, Dok Grotsnik relishes the butchery of the battlefield. He is quite, quite mad and remarkably dangerous, treating each new war as an opportunity for experimentation, a chance to harvest new samples to add to his stockpile of gory anatomical spares.

otherAbilities.name: Mad Dok:
otherAbilities.description: While this model is leading a unit, models in that unit have the Feel No Pain 5+ ability.

otherAbilities.name: One Scalpel Short of a Medpack:
otherAbilities.description: While this model is leading a unit, that unit is eligible to declare a charge in a turn in which it Fell Back .
